devices.name: LED Bulb
devices.detail: Converts 85% of electrical energy to light. Only 15% becomes heat.

devices.name: CFL Bulb
devices.detail: Compact fluorescent: 70% to light, 30% to heat.

devices.name: Incandescent
devices.detail: Only 5% becomes light! 95% wasted as heat.

devices.name: Electric Motor
devices.detail: Converts electrical to mechanical energy. 20% lost to heat/friction.

devices.name: Gasoline Engine
devices.detail: Burns fuel: 75% lost to heat, exhaust, and friction.

devices.name: Diesel Engine
devices.detail: More efficient than gasoline due to higher compression.

devices.name: Human Muscles
devices.detail: Chemical energy from food â†’ mechanical work. 75% becomes body heat.

devices.name: Coal Plant
devices.detail: Burns coal to make steam. Most energy lost in cooling towers.

devices.name: Natural Gas Plant
devices.detail: Combined cycle plants achieve higher efficiency than coal.

devices.name: Solar Panel
devices.detail: Photovoltaic cells: Most sunlight becomes heat, not electricity.

devices.name: Wind Turbine
devices.detail: Betz limit caps max at 59%. Real turbines reach ~40%.

devices.name: Hydroelectric Dam
devices.detail: Gravity-driven water: Very efficient energy conversion.

devices.name: Bicycle
devices.detail: Almost all pedaling force becomes forward motion.

devices.name: Steam Engine
devices.detail: Historical engines were very inefficient by modern standards.

devices.name: Electric Heater
devices.detail: 100% of electricity becomes heat - the desired output!

devices.name: Heat Pump
devices.detail: Moves 3J of heat for every 1J electricity. COP > 1 possible!
